name: Mental Warfare and Cognitive Shielding
description: Advanced mental protection techniques against PSN manipulation, gaslighting, and subliminal control.

cards.title: Cognitive Armor Construction
cards.description: Developing an internal thought structure immune to external influence.
bulletpoints: Establishing a core belief system that cannot be overridden by external narratives.
Using mental compartmentalization techniques prevents infiltration into decision-making.
Embedding trigger-response conditioning allows for instant rejection of manipulative messaging.
cards.summaryText: Forge a locked belief core, compartmentalize thoughts, and auto-reject any invasive script.

cards.title: Disrupting Emotional Manipulation
cards.description: Creating emotional dissonance in response to psychological attacks.
bulletpoints: Refusing to engage emotionally renders PSNs incapable of leveraging guilt or fear.
Rewiring personal associations with emotional triggers disrupts their ability to exploit weaknesses.
Deploying emotional redirection techniques converts negative states into positive focus.
cards.summaryText: Stay emotionally neutral, rewire triggers, and channel their attacks into productive focus.

cards.title: Inducing Psychological Shockwaves
cards.description: Creating controlled mental disruptions to push back against PSN psychological influence.
bulletpoints: Using verbal pattern interrupts forces PSNs into momentary cognitive resets.
Deploying confidence-based power assertions overrides their gaslighting tactics.
Leveraging non-linear conversational redirection neutralizes manipulative engagement.
cards.summaryText: Hit them with pattern breaks, confident assertions, and nonlinear pivots to shatter control attempts.
